and I heard the Lord speak in my heart
something that surprised me and what I
heard him say was I'm going to teach you
about government and my first response
was inwardly sort of an oh no and I
yawned I mean I was the guy that fell
asleep in civics class in high school
okay I mean I'm not I was never into

government
